籤詩版本二:
Chirongwa, bhuku, uye bhuku.Usatya kuita mushure mekufunga usati wafunga.
Kana nguva yasvika, vanhu vanokudzwa vanogona kukubatsira, uye iwe unogona kugara murugare segaza.
詩意:
Hexagram imba iyi yakaita semadziro.
Zvose zvakachengeteka uye hazvina ngozi.
解曰: Ita chimwe chinhu chitsva kubva kune chinhu chekare. Maruva anotonhora anosangana muchirimo. Yakambovharwa. Iye zvino ndagutsikana.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Ji akarayira Jehovha
MuMing Dynasty, Liu Ji, ane zita rekuremekedza rainzi Bowen uye zita rekuti Wencheng, akaberekerwa muQingtian (yava kunzi Wencheng County), Zhejiang.
Akanyatso kuverengwa muzvinyorwa zvekare uye nhoroondo, uye akanaka pakunyora nhetembo uye zvinyorwa. Aivewo nyanzvi mune zvenyeredzi uye zvechiuto uye akabatsira Zhu Yuanzhang kubatanidza nyika.
Panguva iyoyo, Zhu Yuanzhang akasarudza uye akatungamirira masoja ake kuAnfeng, achitarisira kusunungura Guta reAnfeng rakakombwa.
Liu Ji akauya kuzomudzivisa nekukasira, achitonga kuti aizokundwa kana akaenda ikoko. Sezvaitarisirwa naLiu Ji, Zhu Yuanzhang akabatwa.
Vakuru vakuru Xu Da naChang Yuchun vakauya kuzomununura, uye Zhu Yuanzhang akakwanisa kutiza.
聖意: Rombo rakanaka reimba neimba, pachezvako, paupfumi, matambudziko ebhizinesi, kuroora, kuvakadzi vari kufamba muLiujia, kunonoka silkworms, mombe nhanhatu, kutsvaga vanhu, kunonoka kutongwa kweruzhinji, kutamira kune dzimwe nyika, kurasikirwa nepfuma. uye hapana tsvakiridzo, yekurwara, yekuchengeta makuva muYan'an Mountain, uye nerombo rakanaka.
